title: Episode #24: Toxic schedules and television are damaging our minds and bodies
description: Crazy schedules and too much television lead to one thing: unhealthy lifestyle choices. In this episode I discuss the affects of crazy schedules and television on our minds and bodies, and how to get back to making healthy lifestyle choices.
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
itunes:summary: Crazy schedules and too much television lead to one thing: unhealthy lifestyle choices. In this episode I discuss the affects of crazy schedules and television on our minds and bodies, and how to get back to making healthy lifestyle choices.
